name: DementiaFacts2022
0:
”Alexa, open dementia facts”
”Alexa, start dementia facts”
”Alexa, ask dementia facts for a fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dementia facts
des: This skill provides timely information regarding the current challenges our world is facing when it comes to various forms of dementia and dementia care. The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
